listAward.awardName: East Stroudsburg Univeristy Computer Science Endowed Scholarship Recipient

projectList.description: A personalized website that details my progress in my career via jobs and projects undertaken as well as my personal interest.

A windows desktop program that takes a user Zoom meeting and will automatically open the window at set time. Should be used for reoccuring meetings like online school courses. Created this to streamline opening Zoom for my courses, especially when the Zoom URL was emailed the first week of school only and we are 4 weeks in.
A group project to recreate a Spider Soliatre in C++
A e-commerce website on a product known as IARE. IARE is air taken from different areas around the world and shipped as a air-sealed jar to consumers.

interestSummary: It is hard to write down all of my interests because, in this awesome world, there is an endless supply of them. Yet, I will attempt.
interestList: Attempting to paint - Not going too well
